text: Hungarian Rhapsody () is a 1954 French-German historical musical film directed by Peter Berneis and André Haguet and starring Colette Marchand, Paul Hubschmid and Michel Simon.Bock & Bergfelder p.134 A separate French-language version ' was also made. ==Cast== * Colette Marchand as Caroline von Sayn- Wittgenstein * Paul Hubschmid as Franz Liszt * Michel Simon as General von Sayn-Wittgenstein * Willy Fritsch as Großherzog * Peter Lehmbrock as Richard Wagner * Margot Leonard as Wanda * Yves Brainville as Dingelstedt * Jacqueline Gay as Nathalie * Lucienne Legrand as Maria Pawlowna == References == == Bibliography == * Bock, Hans-Michael & Bergfelder, Tim. The Concise CineGraph. Encyclopedia of German Cinema. Berghahn Books, 2009. == External links == * Category:1954 films Category:French films Category:French biographical films Category:French historical musical films Category:West German films Category:German historical musical films Category:German biographical films Category:1950s biographical films Category:1950s historical musical films Category:German-language films Category:Films set in the 1840s Category:Films set in the 1850s Category:Films set in the 1860s Category:Biographical films about musicians Category:Films about classical music and musicians Category:Films about composers Category:German multilingual films Category:French multilingual films Category:1950s multilingual films
title: Hungarian Rhapsody (1954 film)
